nodes.text: Halsoun monks were a group of monks. According to Bardottan culture, dagoyan masters should not seperate themselves from the rest of society. However, some felt impulsed to remove themselves from society, so they go to the Halsoun Dagoyan Monastery.
Halsoun monks went months or years without speaking or seeing a fellow Bardottan. They lived in tiny cells and spent time in constant meditation.
